name: promptcast
title: PromptCast
description: Your personal AI prompt library. Save prompts, add variables, and launch them to Claude or ChatGPT with a keystroke. Stop copying and pasting - start prompting smarter.

commands.name: my-ai-prompts
commands.title: My AI Prompts
commands.description: Search your saved prompts and launch them to Claude or ChatGPT. Organize prompts with tags and use variables for quick customization.
commands.subtitle: Search and launch AI prompts

commands.name: create-ai-prompt
commands.title: Create AI Prompt
commands.description: Quickly save a new AI prompt with tags and variables. Access it later from My Prompts to launch across Claude or ChatGPT.
commands.subtitle: Save a new prompt to your library

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: harish_garg
